Reviews.Title: perfect camera
Reviews.Author: campbell
Reviews.Content: compact size fits in my hand & the zoom is better then the very big camera I had before this. The clarity of the pictures is amazing

Reviews.Title: not recommend
Reviews.Author: Nestor Oscar
Reviews.Content: is good about taking photographs but when using the zoom your images are of low quality and blurry for the price not recommend

Reviews.Title: Olympus VR 310
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: Fabulous little camera.  Takes great photos, really clear.  Far better than other little cameras in this price range that my family members have bought.  Thoroughly recommend.  In fact, I am replacing mine that was dropped with the lens out.  Figure it's not worth getting repaired.
